input.label: Show only those events which has caused alert

choice.value: | eval hash=sha512(_raw) | lookup eiq_alerts_list event_hash as hash OUTPUTNEW event_hash value_eiq confidence_eiq | search event_hash =*

search.query: | rest /services/data/transforms/lookups | table eai:acl.app filename title fields_list id | rename eai:acl.app as App, filename as "Lookup File", title as Title, fields_list as "Fields", id as Endpoint| search App="TA-eclecticiq" Title="eiq_alerts_list" | stats count

`eiq_er_index` sourcetype="eclecticiq:er:json" $checkbox$| rename value_eiq as "Observable Value", confidence_eiq as Maliciousness, @timestamp as Time, @host_identifier as Host, platform as OS | eval _pid=coalesce(process_guid, pid),_eventtime=_time, _event_hash=hash , _raw1=Time.Host.OS.'Observable Value'.Maliciousness._pid._eventtime._event_hash , _raw2=_raw| table Time, Host, OS, "Observable Value", Maliciousness _pid _eventtime _event_hash _raw1 _raw2 | search _raw1="*$search$*" OR _raw2="*$search$*"
